body_html:
@terribilissimo The environment of your PC is so complex. I have seen move than three Python distributions in your PATH. And it seems that you did not install it into the first python in PATH, so the error occurs.
List of your Python related dirs in PATH:

   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\Lib\site-packages\PyQt4\
   [ E] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\Anacond\anaconda\
   [ E] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\Anacond\anaconda\Scripts\
   [  ] C:\Python27\
   [  ] C:\Python27\DLLs\
   [ E] C:\Python27\Scripts\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\Lib\site-packages\vtk\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\gnuplot\binary\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\Lib\site-packages\osgeo\
   [  ] C:\Program Files (x86)\pythonxy\SciTE-3.5.1-4\
   [  ] C:\Program Files (x86)\pythonxy\console\
   [ E] C:\anaconda\
   [ E] C:\anaconda\Scripts\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\AlgoreteLoopy\Loopy\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\AlgoreteLoopy\Loopy\DLLs\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\AlgoreteLoopy\Loopy\Scripts\

But the installation dir is c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai\lib\site-packages\torch. Can you please make sure that the one used by PyTorch is the first one when it is running? Otherwise, you can clean your envs to make it look tidy.

body:
@terribilissimo The environment of your PC is so complex. I have seen move than three Python distributions in your PATH. And it seems that you did not install it into the first python in PATH, so the error occurs. 
List of your Python related dirs in PATH:
```
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\Lib\site-packages\PyQt4\
   [ E] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\Anacond\anaconda\
   [ E] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\Anacond\anaconda\Scripts\
   [  ] C:\Python27\
   [  ] C:\Python27\DLLs\
   [ E] C:\Python27\Scripts\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\Lib\site-packages\vtk\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\gnuplot\binary\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\python2\Lib\site-packages\osgeo\
   [  ] C:\Program Files (x86)\pythonxy\SciTE-3.5.1-4\
   [  ] C:\Program Files (x86)\pythonxy\console\
   [ E] C:\anaconda\
   [ E] C:\anaconda\Scripts\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\AlgoreteLoopy\Loopy\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\AlgoreteLoopy\Loopy\DLLs\
   [  ] C:\Program Files\ScyPython\AlgoreteLoopy\Loopy\Scripts\
```
But the installation dir is `c:\users\poko\anaconda2\envs\fastai\lib\site-packages\torch`. Can you please make sure that the one used by PyTorch is the first one when it is running? Otherwise, you can clean your envs to make it look tidy.
